body: Your eidolon excels at a movement type you do not possess. Your eidolon receives a +5-foot enhancement bonus to one type of speed it has that you do not, such as a climb or swim speed. If your eidolon doesn't already possess such a mode of movement, you may apply this trait bonus later if it gains an evolution that grants it such a mode. Once this bonus is applied to a mode of movement, it can't be switched to another mode.
name: Desperate Speed
url: pfsrd://Ultimate Campaign/Rules/Character Background/Traits/Basic Traits/Magic Traits/Desperate Speed
